DataElement.preferredName: Patient Refractory Progressive Disease Therapeutic Procedure Intolerance Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to disease progression which is resistant and intolerant to therapy as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Refractory Disease Progressive Disease Therapeutic Procedure Intolerance Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A disease that resists treatment._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An inability to absorb or metabolize certain substances in the normal way._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Refractory Disease Progressive Disease Therapeutic Procedure Intolerance Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A disease that resists treatment.:A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:An inability to absorb or metabolize certain substances in the normal way.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
An inability to absorb or metabolize certain substances in the normal way.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have IPSS interm
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have IPSS intermediate-2 or high risk CMML that is refractory to treatment with HMA therapy at the time of enrollment defined as: progression to AML, failure to respond to HMA therapy, recurrence or progression of CMML following initial response to HMA therapy, intolerance to HMAs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have IPSS intermediate-2 or high risk CMML that is refractory to treatment with HMA therapy at the time of enrollment defined as: progression to AML, failure to respond to HMA therapy (no complete response by at least 6 cycles or any progression of disease prior), recurrence or progression of CMML following initial response to HMA therapy, intolerance to HMAs?
